flawed_nl_solution:
He has 3 hours to read because 8 - 3.5 - 1.5 = <<8-3.5-1.5=3>>3
He has 108 minutes to read because 3 x 60 = <<3*60=108>>108
He can read 1080 words because 108 x 10 = <<108*10=1080>>1080
#### 1080

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 180, not 108. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
